translations: n.手柄；耳朵；耳状物；笨蛋；支托；接线片；水果装运箱

sentences.sentence: I had to lug my bags up to the fourth floor.
sentences.translation: 我只得费劲地把我的几个包拖上五楼。

sentences.sentence: Nobody wants to lug around huge suitcases full of clothes.
sentences.translation: 没有人愿意拖着装满衣服的大箱子到处转。

sentences.sentence: I managed to lug the wet clothes to the laundromat.
sentences.translation: 我设法把湿衣服拖到自助洗衣店。
